review: Bought this for my husband for Father's Day.  Works well.  Easy to use. The whole family loves to play the games you install via your phone.
author: Angie

review: Love it. Make sure you have a strong internet connection. It works great.
author: Joey G

review: I wanted to watch Tennis Channel Plus on TV, but Chromecast doesn't support it. I replaced the Chromecast with ROKU
author: Srinivasan Chandrasekaran

review: It is a chromecast, nothing much I can say.  A very good bang for your buck.
author: Pedro D. Quezada

review: This thing is super cool. I didn't know devices like this existed!So, I'm a huge fan of watching movies on my laptop, but I get tired of looking at the tiny screen. This amazing device allows me to play whatever movie is going on my laptop onto my television! It gives instructions on how to connect everything, but once you're set up you can pretty much do anything on your laptop and have it screen on your TV.Also, if you have google play (not sure if it works with other music apps/sites, never tried it), you can connect your google play app to your TV using your chrome cast. Now you can play your music even louder!Definitely worth the price of this product. Highly recommend.
author: #teamiphone6
